parameters.pm_SelectString: CAST(timestamp AS BIGINT) AS timestamp, No_, Entity, [Contact No_] AS Contact_No_, Name, [Name 2] AS Name_2, [Post Code] AS PostCode, City, [Country_Region Code] AS Country_Region_Code, [NACE 2 Code] AS NACE_2_Code, Description, [Max Quantity (Long-Term License)] AS Max_Quantity_Long_Term_License

CAST(timestamp AS BIGINT) AS timestamp, Code, Name,
    [Technology Group Code] AS Technology_Group_Code,
    [Sort Order] AS SortOrder
CAST(timestamp AS BIGINT) AS timestamp, Code, Name, [Sort Order] AS SortOrder

pm_SelectString.value:
CAST(timestamp AS BIGINT) AS timestamp, [Source Entity] AS Source_Entity, [Vendor DIM Code] AS Vendor_DIM_Code, 
[Manufacturer Item No_] AS Manufacturer_Item_No_, [Item Category Code] AS Item_Category_Code,
[PG1 Code] AS PG1_Code, [PG2 Code] AS PG2_Code, Description, [Description 2] AS Description_2,
[Description 3] AS Description_3, [Description 4] AS Description_4, [Item Disc_ Group] AS Item_Disc_Group,
[BUSINESSTYPE Dimension Code] AS BUSINESSTYPE_Dimension_Code, [Life Cycle Formula] AS Life_Cycle_Formula,
[Physical Goods] AS Physical_Goods, [Lic Band Min_] AS Lic_Band_Min_, [Lic Band Max_] AS Lic_Band_Max_,
[Technology Code] AS Technology_Code, [Default Technology] AS Default_Technology

dependsOn.activity: Get Table Names and Load Types

activities.name: Get Table Names and Load Types

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT TABLE_NAME, WATERMARK
  FROM [adf].[CT_IGSQL03_TABLES]
  where DATABASE_NAME = '@{pipeline().parameters.pm_DatabaseName}'
SELECT COUNT(timestamp) AS rows FROM dbo.[@{item().TABLE_NAME}] WHERE cast([timestamp] as bigint) > @{item().WATERMARK}
SELECT * FROM dbo.[@{item().TABLE_NAME}] WHERE cast([timestamp] as bigint) > @{item().WATERMARK}
Select MAX(cast([timestamp] as bigint)) as NewWatermark FROM [dbo].[@{item().TABLE_NAME}]
